alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Magoffin; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 3:59PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Perry, northern Knott, southern Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 430 PM EST... At 358 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chavies, or 11 miles northwest of Hazard, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dice and Hardshell around 405 PM EST. Ary, Talcum, Rowdy, Noble and Fisty around 410 PM EST. Hindman, Bearville, Vest, Elmrock, Buck, Tina, Emmalena, Carrie and Decoy around 415 PM EST. Pippa Passes, Yellow Mountain, Soft Shell, Garner, Vail and Leburn around 420 PM EST. Mousie, Bolyn, Handshoe, Larkslane, Mid, Hollybush and Gunlock around 425 PM EST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Dwarf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for southeastern Kentucky.
